name: Video simili duplicate cleaner
description: Video simili duplicate cleaner is a program that can find duplicate and similar video files.

scripts.postbump: npm run binaries || npm run win-binaries && git add -f CHANGELOG.md QtProject/app/version.txt QtProject/release-build/macos/Info.plist QtProject/release-build/windows/appxmanifest.xml package-lock.json package.json

scripts.notif-push:
echo '

 Remember to push commits and tags with 
 git push && git push --tags'
scripts.build: npm run update-build-version && npm run build-mac-binaries --prefix QtProject/release-build/macos
scripts.build-arm: npm run update-build-version && npm run build-mac-arm-binaries --prefix QtProject/release-build/macos
scripts.copy-binaries: cp 'QtProject/release-build/macos/Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' && cp -R 'QtProject/release-build/macos/Video simili duplicate cleaner.app' '../' & cp 'QtProject/release-build/macos/Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg' '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg'
scripts.binaries-intelmac: npm run kill-app && npm run delete-binaries && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-binaries && npm run clean
scripts.binaries: npm run kill-app && npm run delete-binaries && npm run clean && npm run build-arm && npm run copy-binaries && npm run macos-test-app-receipt && npm run clean
scripts.manual-binaries: npm run binaries && npm run add-receit
scripts.delete-binaries: (rm -r '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.app' || exit 0) && (rm -r '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.dmg' || exit 0) && (rm -r '../Video simili duplicate cleaner.pkg' || exit 0)
scripts.win-bundle: npm run win-binaries && npm run win-binaries-x64 && npm run win-create-bundle-folder && npm run win-create-bundle
scripts.win-binaries: npm run win-clean && npm run win-build-arm64 && npm run win-copy-binaries-arm64 && npm run win-copy-vcredist-arm64 && npm run win-clean
scripts.win-binaries-x64: npm run win-clean && npm run win-build-x64 && npm run win-copy-binaries-x64 && npm run win-copy-vcredist-x64 && npm run win-clean
scripts.win-build-arm64: npm run update-build-version && npm run build-win-binaries-arm64 --prefix QtProject/release-build/windows
scripts.win-build-x64: npm run update-build-version && npm run build-win-binaries-x64 --prefix QtProject/release-build/windows
scripts.win-copy-binaries-arm64: copy "QtProject\release-build\windows\Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix" "..\Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix"
scripts.win-copy-binaries-x64: copy "QtProject\release-build\windows\Video simili duplicate cleaner.x64.msix" "..\Video simili duplicate cleaner.x64.msix"
scripts.win-create-bundle-folder: if not exist "..\bundle" mkdir "..\bundle" & copy "..\Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix" "..\bundle" & copy "..\Video simili duplicate cleaner.x64.msix" "..\bundle"
scripts.win-create-bundle: MakeAppx bundle /d "..\bundle" /p "..\Video simili duplicate cleaner.msixbundle" & rmdir /s /q "..\bundle"
